title: 3.5 Million Followers on Facebook and Nobody In Scotland Knows Him....
text:
3.5 Million Followers on Facebook and Nobody In Scotland Knows Him.... Share Article Steven Aitchison is taking his business knowledge on the road with a spectacular lineup of speakers for a two day event at Dundas Castle, in Edinburgh on June 15th-16th with YDF Scotland 2017 Steven Aitchison, creator of Your Digital Formula Business is no longer about CEO’s hiding in ivory towers. It’s about being social, about being genuine, authentic and speaking to customers. What I teach is social entrepreneurship, and that is sharing your knowledge using the power of social media Edinburgh, Scotland (PRWEB UK) 23 February 2017 Steven has grown his social media presence to over 4 million followers across all his social media platforms including Facebook, Instagram, Youtube and Twitter. He now teaches how to grow a following and create a business online with his program Your Digital Formula Now, he’s taking his knowledge on the road. Steven announced today that he is bringing entrepreneurs from around the world to Edinburgh, Scotland, in June for a two day event. “I want to make Scotland a destination for online entrepreneurs to gather and learn from some of the leading voices in business, success mindset, and growth. But, I want to make the event memorable, which is why we’ve chosen Dundas Castle as the venue just outside the beautiful city of Edinburgh.” After experiencing business growth using the power of social media, Steven Aitchison (whose Facebook fans exceed 3.5 million and whose 2 daily Facebook LIVE shows have over 100K viewers a week) poured his knowledge into a program he created, Your Digital Formula (YDF). “Business is no longer about CEO’s hiding in ivory towers. It’s about being social, about being genuine, authentic and speaking to customers. What I teach is social entrepreneurship, and that is sharing your knowledge using the power of social media,” says Steven. Entrepreneurs who are members of YDF (especially in the industries of personal development, coaching, authors/writers, teachers and service providers) have grown their businesses by expanding their client base to reach global audiences with the use of Social Media. Not only is social media a powerful tool to growing your business, Steven says that the entrepreneurs he’s helping are also giving back to the world in expansive and healing ways which ignites his commitment, even more. By bringing this exciting event to Scotland, Steven hopes to welcome Scotland’s entrepreneurs into the fold with him. Steven’s first successful event held in London 2016 led to entrepreneurs wanting more and Steven is set to bring it to them annually right here in Scotland, starting this June with YDF Scotland 2017 . Speakers include, Jack Black, Terri Cole, Steven Aitchison and more.
